The '''Scrolls Champion Cape''' is a [[cape]] that was given out to high-ranking players of [[Mojang]]'s game ''[[Caller's Bane]]'', formerly known as ''Scrolls''.

== Distribution ==
Starting on November 7th, 2014, this cape was given to players who earned first place on the ''Scrolls'' weekly ladder five separate times.<ref name="Scrolls cape announcement">https://web.archive.org/web/20160320011410/https://scrolls.com/2014/11/up-up-and-away</ref> As of September 30, 2015, capes were no longer given out for this.<ref name="Scrolls cape ended">https://web.archive.org/web/20160308073845/https://scrolls.com/2015/09/greeting-fellow-citizens-of-the-internet</ref> This is due to the fact that the player counts had gotten too low for the environment to remain competitive.<ref name="Scrolls cape ending">https://web.archive.org/web/20150718025116/http://scrollsdev.tumblr.com:80/post/124058513081/scrolls-faq</ref>

During [[MINECON 2015]], the Scrolls MINECON Open was held for ''Scrolls''' in-game items and other prizes, with the top four players also getting the cape.<ref name="Scrolls MINECON Open">https://web.archive.org/web/20160314103615/https://scrolls.com/2015/06/announcing-the-minecon-open</ref>

On December 11-12, 2014, all players were temporarily shown with this cape to celebrate the release of ''Scrolls''.<ref name="Scrolls temporary cape">{{tweet|ScrollsGame|543059457698463744|What's that on your back?! In Minecraft, you'll see a #Scrolls cape for the next two days to celebrate our launch! Woohoo!}}</ref>
